trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os dados para o evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: A tracking service that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> interface raises a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event to notify the runtime tracking infrastructure that the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço de acompanhamento que implementa o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> interface gera um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> eventos para notificar a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução que o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> para um determinado fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type> foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The tracking service uses a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> to provide the workflow <xref:System.Type> and the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Usa o serviço de controle de um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> para fornecer o fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type> e o novo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> uses a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> when it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> usa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> quando ele gera o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: When it receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure will update the tracking profile for the specified workflow <xref:System.Type> in its profile cache.
trans-unit.target: Quando ele recebe um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> evento, o infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução atualizará o perfil de rastreamento do fluxo de trabalho especificado <xref:System.Type> no cache do perfil.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor when you raise a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event inside a tracking service, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar este construtor quando você gerar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> evento dentro de um serviço de controle, você deve definir explicitamente <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of workflow for which the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> de fluxo de trabalho para o qual o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" />.
trans-unit.target: O novo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs" /> class that specifies a new <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> for the specified workflow <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs" /> que especifica um novo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> para o fluxo de trabalho <see cref="T:System.Type" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> is created with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> set to the specified <xref:System.Type> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> set to the specified profile.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> é criada com <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> definido como especificado <xref:System.Type> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> definida para o perfil especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> for the workflow Type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o novo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> para o tipo de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> for the workflow type.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> para o tipo de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução recebe um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> evento atualizará seu cache de perfil com o novo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> do fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type> especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the workflow whose <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> should be updated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do fluxo de trabalho cujo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> deve ser atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> de um fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> specifies the workflow <xref:System.Type> for which the tracking profile has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> Especifica o fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type> para que o perfil de rastreamento foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> is set to the new tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> é definido como o novo perfil de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Quando a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução recebe um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> evento atualizará seu cache de perfil com o novo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> do fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>.
